reviewText: The quality of the DVD looks like someone made a "home copy." I was turned off by the lack of quality of the recording. It's an embarrassment.
summary: The content is overshadowed by the low quality video
Title: Hebrew or the So-Called Negro?

reviewText: The Hebrew or the So-Called Negro? by Yahya Bandele links African slavery to the judgements  spoken of in Deutoronomy 28 of the Bible hence demonstrating that the African slaves were Jews. This to me makes perfect sense. However, what I was hoping to get from this film was a better understanding of was the connection that these African slaves had to Judaism -i.e. the tribes they came from, were they known to be Hebrew tribes, thus were picked to be put on slave ships. This is what I wanted to find out and it was not answered here. So this is why I am giving it a three star.  The filming needs some tweaking but overall for someone who has never heard about the Hebrew roots of Africans in North,South,Central  Americas and the Caribbean, this is a good film to start with.
summary: Hebrew or the So-Called Negro not exactly what I expected.
Title: Hebrew or the So-Called Negro?

reviewText: THe editors's explanation of how European gentiles stole the Hebrew heritage of African Americans through slavery is far-reaching to say the least. The African slave trade was started by Africans in Africa along with muslim Arabs operating in Africa. Europeans arrived on the scene late and tapped in to an already existing slave trade. They arrived on the West coast of Africa (and did not go in to the interior of Africa), and traded with the African and Arab slave-traders for African slaves. The overwhelming majority of today's African-Americans are descended from Africans from West Africa (which is nowhere near East Africa or the Levant area of present day Israel). The religion of the Africans at the time of the European slave-trade era was overwhelmingly muslim or animist - not Jewish (or Christian either for that matter). This film appears to be just another distortion brought about by Afro-centric interests who wish to bash non-Jewish white males (they refer to them as European gentiles) in a typical display of a politically correct slanting and distortion of history.
Title: Hebrew or the So-Called Negro?

reviewText: This is truly the best documentary I've seen in my life thus far! Seir and they are not Hebrew Yisraelites but are IMPOSTURES = (rev 2:9,3:9,12:9)(baruch 4:30-35)(Book of Jasher 82:52-62)(1maccabees 3:45-48)(2maccabees 6:6-9)(john 8:44)(job 9:24)(isa 44:5)(jere 8:8,16:3-4,38:19,49:16-18)(deut 16:18)(isa 4:16,14:12-17,14:12-14)(matt 24:11-12)(job 1:68,9:24,30:5-8,29)(gen 25:21-25,27:39-40,36:1-43)(eze 22:26-27)(habak 2:5)(gen 25:25)(heb 12:16-17)(rom 9:11-13)(mala 1:1-4)(obadiah 1-21)(dan 7:25)(prov 15:25)(psa 96:4-5)(rev 2:13-16,12:13). People, the twelve tribes were and are scattered throughout the world and here are some of the lands where the dwell today: Judah = Negros/America Blacks = (gen 49: 8-12)(deut 28:37, 48-68, 68, 33:7)(joel 3:1,3-8)(jere 14:2)(luk 21: 20-22)(zac 12:7)(jam 1:1). Benjamin = West Indians, Jamaica, Trinidad = (gen 49:27)(deut 33:12). Levi = Hati = (gen 49:5-7)(deut 33: 8-11)(mala 2:1,3,8,9). Simeon = Dominican Rep = gen 49:5-7)(deut 33: 8-11). Zebulon = Guatemala to Panama (Mayans) = gen 49:13)(deut 33:18-19). Ephraim/Joseph = Puerto Rico = (gen 49:22-26)(hosea 4:17-19, 7:8,11)(deut 33:13-17). Manasseh/Joseph = Cuba = (gen 49:22-26)(hosea 4:17-19)(duet 33:13-17). Gad = N. American Indians = (gen 49:19)(duet 33:20-21)(num 15:38)(1chron 12:8, 5:18)(2esdras 13:40-46). Reuben = Seminole Indians = (gen 49:3-4)(1chron 5:18)(deut 33:6). Napthali = Argentia and Chile = (gen 49:21)(deut 33:23). Asher = Columbia to Uruguay (Incas), Venezuela, Brazil = (gen 49:20)(deut 33: 24-25). Issachar = Mexico (Aztecs) = (gen 49: 14-15)(deut 33: 18-19)(hosea 8:13)(1chron 12:32). These twelve tribes are clearly discussed in (gene 49:1-33)(deut 33:5-39)(1chron 12:20-40)(rev 7:1-8) and other biblical precepts/verses. This was/is part of the strategic plan of our governments worldwide to suppress any indication of light that could empower, enlighten or reaffirm the significant roles of "Black" people = (acts 5:30-32)(exo 19:5-6)(job 9:24)(deut 7:6-8)(ezek 37:1-14)(1king 8:47)(psa 82:1-8,147:19-20). This was the ultimate point of the Trans-Atlantic Slave Trade to rob ALL "Black"/Brown people of their BIRTHRIGHT, spirit and selfworth by "shipping them to four the corners of the earth with a yoke of iron upon their necks to be sold as slaves" = (DEUTERONOMY 28:1-68)(2esdras 13:39-46)(dan 9:11-12)(nahum 3:9-10)(psa 83:1-12)(zech 11:5)!
